## Email Verification Backend (Resend)
- Create a Resend account and get an API key
- Add these env vars on Render:
  - RESEND_API_KEY
  - RESEND_FROM (a verified sender address)
  - ALLOWED_ORIGIN=https://j0j011.github.io
- Deploy the `server/` folder as a Render Web Service
